ganapati_sankalpa.text: Mama Upaatta Samastha Duritakshaya dwaaraa Sri Vallabha Sri Maha Ganapati preethyartham tarpanam karishye

theertha_mantra.text: Aayur Aarogyam Aishwarya Balam Pushtir Mahad Yashah। Kavitvam Bhukti Mukticha Chaturavrutti Tarpanaath ॥
